resources.string:
Le Méditerranéen restaurant is located in the Es Seddikia district, in the municipality of Oran.

 Specialty
 In a pleasant and warm setting, the restaurant Le Méditerranéen offers dishes based on fresh fish as well as innovative culinary dishes. The restaurant also offers meat dishes.

 Opening hours
 The restaurant is open from Saturday to Thursday from 11:30 to 15:00 and 18:30 to 23:30.

 On Fridays, it is open only in the evening.

 Rate
 Approximately 2500 dinars per person.

 Coordinates
 The Mediterranean restaurant

 Address: Mohamed Fertas Avenue, Haï Es-Seddikia, 31000, Oran, Algeria.

 Telephone: +213 (0) 41 42 95 13
\ Mobile: +213 (0) 560 00 41 00

le Petit Chalet restaurant is a gastronomic establishment located in the municipality of Kristel about ten kilometers east of the city center of Oran.

 The restaurant is ideally located at the edge of a cliff with a magnificent view of the sea. The building, built in 1926 has several terraces with sea views.

 Specialty
The property mainly serves seafood dishes.

 Rate
Around 2000 dinars per person.

 Coordinates
The Petit Chalet restaurant

Address: Ain Franine Road, Kristel, 31000, Oran, Algeria.

Telephone: +213 (0) 542 35 66 47
Bab Errayane is a fast food restaurant, located in the city center of Oran, on the very commercial street Khemisti.

"Le Corsaire is located in the old quarter of Sidi El Houari, in the municipality of Oran, near the Promenade Ibn Badis and the Palais du Bey.\n\n The Corsair is considered the most famous seafood restaurant in Oran. It has a small outdoor terrace."
"The Sheraton Hotel is a 5-star hotel located a short walk from the center of Oran in the Seddikia district overlooking the beautiful bay of Oran."
"Le Méridien is a luxury 5-star hotel located a few kilometers east of downtown Oran."
"The "Liberty Hotel" is a 4-star hotel establishment located in the area of seats near the University of Oran (USTO)."
"Les Ambassadeurs hotel is a 3-star hotel located in the district of Haï Karama in Oran."

"The Andalouses beach is located in the town of El Ançor, in the wilaya of Oran.\n\n It is shared between a private beach (fee) and a public beach (free). At the private beach, the rental of chairs, tables and umbrellas is possible around 200 to 400 dinars."
"Paradis Plage is located between Bouisseville beach and Clairefontaine beach, in the municipality of Aïn El Turk, in the wilaya of Oran."

Saint Roch is a beach located in the town of Ain El Turk, exactly between the tip of Saint Roch and the beach of Trouville. From the beach you will have a view of the Rock of the Old and the Djebel Santon.
"Bomo beach is located between the beach of Coralès and the beach of Etoile, on the commune of Bousfer, in the wilaya of Oran."
The museum "Ahmed Zabana" is located in the district of Haï Sidi El Bachir in Oran.
"The Museum of Modern Art (MAMO) is located on the famous street Larbi Ben M'Hidi in the historic heart of the city of Oran."
The Mujahid Museum is located near the headquarters of Sonatrach and the Great Ibn Badis Mosque in Oran.
